about_the_game:
Story

Long ago, dragons emerged from the fiery depths of the sun, engulfing the land in flames and destruction. A hero, Darreth, rose to the challenge and sealed the dragons within the Arcadia dungeons—but his victory came at a cost.

The sun was lost, plunging the world into eternal moonlight. Now, as darkness creeps further, a young orphan, Liora, is lured into the treacherous Arcadia dungeons, driven by the hope of restoring balance.

With her loyal friends—Elysia, Thalia, and Borin—she embarks on a perilous quest to reignite the sun and save Eldoria from the encroaching shadows.

Key Features

  • Immersive Storyline: Discover the rich lore of Eldoria, its dragons, and the sacrifice that plunged the world into darkness. Experience an emotional journey filled with mystery, sacrifice, and redemption.

  • Character-Driven: Build bonds between characters, uncover their backstories, and see how their relationships shape the events of the story.

  • Strategic Combat: Engage in turn-based battles where mastering elemental strengths and weaknesses is crucial. Use your characters to fit the foes you're battling, and level up your party for the upcoming battles.

  • Crafting System: Gather rare materials and craft powerful items, potions, and gear to aid you in battle. From healing potions to powerful enchanted equipment, the crafting system is essential to survival.

  • Expansive Dungeons: Explore the ever-changing Arcadia dungeons, each with its own challenges, puzzles, and hidden treasures. No two areas are the same, and danger lurks around every corner.

  • Varied Dungeon Types: Traverse a range of unique dungeons, from icy caverns with slippery floors to an abandoned castle where gargoyles test you with riddles, and who knows—there may even be a hidden village deep within the depths of Arcadia.

Are you ready to step into the darkness and restore the sun?

Wishlist now to stay updated and be among the first to unravel the mysteries of Eldoria.

Staff

Production Team: Stellar Forge

Solo-dev: n3xPRODiGY

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo U7600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6100

name: Tales of Eldoria

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Inter Core i3, AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 1060, AMD Radeon 280X
  • Sound Card: Onboard

short_description: Embark on a journey with Liora, an orphaned child drawn into the mysterious dungeons of Arcadia. Face dangerous foes, uncover ancient secrets, and undo the curse that plunged the world into eternal night. Only by restoring the sun can peace return to the realm of Eldoria.
